title: Looking for people who just want to have fun
body:
I'm not the best or worst player but I'm happy to play on any of the maps. I would also rather play on the different maps, as they are incredibly fun!
If we do play on the Rift, I will only participate in normal games as I find them more fun. Please add me and maybe together we can find a team of 5 :)

If we play normals, I will prefer the supp role or mid.
